title: Physiology & Safety
subtitle: Body first
description: Feeling safe, supported, and regulated enough to engage with intimacy without spiraling.

items.text: Yoga + kettlebell 3x/week; gentle mobility on off days.
Daily pain plan: breath, heat/ice, stretches; track flare triggers.
Create a private, judgment-free space for self-touch & erotic exploration.

title: Emotional Security & Trust
subtitle: Self-trust, boundaries
description: Feeling anchored enough to explore desire without fear or collapse.

items.text: Daily desire check-in (journal/voice): name wants without judgment.
Yes/No calibration: pause, breathe, body-scan before commitments.
Build a desire map: solo, with others, emotional, kink curiosities.
My needs are worthy; I can change my mind mid-scene/date.

title: Relational Connection
subtitle: Exploration with others
description: Safe, shame-free, consensual connection for touch, sex, and play.

items.text: Find 1–2 low-pressure partners (FWB/cuddle buddy/play) aligned on clarity + pace.
Name boundaries & aftercare needs explicitly; schedule check-ins.
Experiment safely: ability to slow down, take breaks, stop.
Pipeline mindset: more than one outlet → less projection on any one person.
List 3 topping scenes & 3 bottoming scenes I want to try again.
Attend a consent/kink workshop; schedule 1 guided practice session.

title: Deep Intimacy
subtitle: Integration & expression
description: Freedom to express sexuality fully, with or without a partner, without pressure.

items.text: Cultivate a longer-term partner/partners aligned on values & pace.
Celebrate others’ experiences as inspiration, not comparison.
Weave sensual rituals into daily life; art/creativity after scenes/dates.
Solo skill drills: rope knots, impact rhythms, dirty talk, receiving practice.
